text: Michael John Love (born 27 November 1973) is an English footballer who most recently played for Northern Premier League Division One South side Barwell, where he played as a defender. Now a coach in and around the Midlands, and current coach with the University of Warwick Men's Football Club. ==Playing career== He made a total of 9 appearances for Sligo. ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Stockport Category:Association football defenders Category:English footballers Category:Hinckley Athletic F.C. players Category:Wigan Athletic F.C. players Category:Wycombe Wanderers F.C. players Category:Sligo Rovers F.C. players Category:Stevenage F.C. players Category:Tamworth F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:Hinckley United F.C. players Category:Brackley Town F.C. players Category:Stratford Town F.C. players Category:Shepshed Dynamo F.C. players Category:Rugby Town F.C. players Category:Barwell F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:League of Ireland players
title: Michael Love (footballer)
